# [Interview #1110: WOR-Scottsdale, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1110#7)

#### the\_archduke

Who are your biggest literary influences?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Robert Jordan (big crowd laugh) and Victor Hugo.
